channel.title: Dear Moparscape
channel.description:
Dear Moparscape guests, members, staff and developers,
I personally am sick of pi, project insanity, the base is so fucking annoying, 80% of new rsps's are based on pi, someone please step up and please, make a new base everyone will love. Someone whose developing release there developed base, make use of it goshhhhhhhhh im so fucking sick of pi!!!!! im going mental .. over this.. this.. madness! it's just pixels but i can't stand it, everyones making pi 'better'.. omg everyone join my server it's pi based and it has chaotic weapons. RSPS is usually for people who want to play the old runescape, if we wanted new runescape we'd go play RUNESCAPE. but alot of people don't want that. they want OLD RUNESCAPE. OLD PIXELS. the biggest problem is pi is people are making it so when you drop items it vanishes. W0WWWWWWWWW!!!!!!
Im going to go play minecraft, 24/7 like a nerd until pi is dumped for something else! please!!!!!!! It's so hard to avoid PROJECT INSANITY, it is SO ****ing annoying! it's so shit now, it use to be good!!@"$@!@"$! but now it's so overly used i wanna blow up rsps with a nuke!@!@
FML we gotta move on, i mean honestly introduce a new base!

item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
